name: Mammoth
description: A massive, woolly beast resembling an enormous elephant with long, curved tusks, characterized by thick fur and a powerful presence.
memorable: Mammoths are formidable opponents on the battlefield, capable of crushing foes with their weight and using their tusks to deal heavy damage.
goals: They generally seek to defend their herd or territory, demonstrating fierce protectiveness when threatened.
relations: Mammoths may be related to other large beasts or encountered alongside similar herbivorous creatures in their natural habitats.
environment: Typically found in icy tundras and cold forests, reflecting their adaptation to frigid climates.
strengths: High damage output from melee attacks, capable of knocking opponents prone, and can control the battlefield effectively.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity score results in difficulty with agility and evasion, leading to challenges in avoiding area effects.
attacks: Specializes in powerful Gore and Stomp attacks, able to knock enemies prone and follow up with additional damage.
most_powerful_ability: Trampling Charge, allowing it to knock enemies prone and follow-up with a Stomp attack as a bonus action.
senses: Has an average passive perception of 13 but is quite poor in stealth with a score of 9.
additional_information: Represents strength and endurance in various cultures.
Large size and thick fur provide some resilience against physical attacks.
Can graze on a wide range of vegetation.
Known for their unique tusks, used for digging through snow.
Can be a combination of herbivore and powerful defender.

herbivore with long tusks and thick fur
fierce defender of territories in cold forests
